mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ARTIST_REPLY (REPLY_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, ARTIST_NUMBER, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_REGISTER_DATE, REPLY_UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_ARTIST_REPLY_NUMBER.NEXTVAL, #{userNumber}, #{artistNumber}, #{replyContent}, #{replyRegisterDate}, #{replyUpdateDate})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(REPLY_NUMBER) FROM TBL_ARTIST_REPLY /*집계함수는 결과가 한 개 나옴*/ WHERE ARTIST_NUMBER = #{artistNumber}
